alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Baldwin, south central Escambia, northern Santa Rosa and northwestern Escambia Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Flomaton to 9 miles west of Molino. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Century, Flomaton, Molino, Jay and Pollard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
